name: Tideline Single Malt
description: A coastal Speyside single malt aged 12 years in sea-air warehouses. Briny minerality meets honey sweetness — the taste of a Scottish shoreline.

tastingNotes.nose: Sea salt, heather honey, and green apple
tastingNotes.palate: Salted caramel, citrus peel, and gentle smoke
tastingNotes.finish: Medium, clean, with a mineral tang

name: Harbourmaster Gin
description: A small-batch London Dry with kelp, samphire, and coastal botanicals hand-foraged from the Scottish coast. Crisp and unmistakably maritime.

tastingNotes.nose: Juniper, sea breeze, and lemon zest
tastingNotes.palate: Bright citrus, saline minerality, and cracked pepper

name: Northshore Vodka
description: Triple-distilled from Scottish winter wheat and filtered through limestone. Exceptionally pure with a silky mouthfeel.

tastingNotes.nose: Clean grain, white flowers, and a hint of chalk
tastingNotes.palate: Silky smooth, subtly sweet, with a mineral backbone

name: Driftwood Blended Scotch
description: A carefully balanced blend of Highland and Islay malts, inspired by evenings around a beach bonfire. Smoke, fruit, and warmth in every sip.

tastingNotes.nose: Bonfire smoke, dried apricot, and vanilla
tastingNotes.palate: Honeyed malt, gentle peat, and baked apple
tastingNotes.finish: Warm, lingering smoke with a toffee sweetness

name: Compass Rose Spiced Rum
description: A Caribbean-sourced rum infused with cinnamon bark, clove, and orange peel — finished in the cool coastal air of Aberdeen.

tastingNotes.nose: Cinnamon, orange marmalade, and brown sugar
tastingNotes.palate: Warm spice, vanilla cream, and dried fruit
tastingNotes.finish: Medium, smooth, with a warming spice kick

name: Salt Meadow Elderflower Gin
description: A delicate gin with wild elderflower, meadowsweet, and coastal grasses. Floral and light — perfect for a summer G&T.

tastingNotes.nose: Elderflower, cut grass, and soft juniper
tastingNotes.palate: Light, floral, with honeyed sweetness and gentle citrus

name: Stormbreak Cask Strength
description: An Islay-style cask strength single malt matured in ex-sherry casks. Intense, briny, and unapologetically bold — for the adventurous drinker.

tastingNotes.nose: Iodine, dark chocolate, and smoked oak
tastingNotes.palate: Intense peat, black cherry, and salted dark caramel
tastingNotes.finish: Very long, powerful, with a maritime smokiness

name: Harbour Lights Irish Whiskey
description: A smooth triple-distilled Irish whiskey finished in port casks. Berry sweetness meets creamy malt — a coastal Irish classic.

tastingNotes.nose: Red berries, cream, and toasted oak
tastingNotes.palate: Silky malt, raspberry jam, and vanilla
